abstract: East Coast members of the Writers Guild of America will meet in New York at 2 p.m. Saturday to discuss the tentative contract language released early Saturday morning. West Coast guild members will meet at 7 p.m. in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: East Coast members of the Writers Guild of America will meet in New York at 2 p.m. Saturday to discuss the tentative contract language released early Saturday morning. West Coast guild members will meet at 7 p.m. in Los Angeles.
